org.apache.flink.api.java.record.operators

Class CrossOperator.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.java.record.operators.CrossOperator.Builder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CrossWithLargeOperator.Builder, CrossWithSmallOperator.Builder
    Enclosing class:
    CrossOperator

    public static class CrossOperator.Builder
extends Object
    Builder pattern, straight from Joshua Bloch's Effective Java (2nd Edition).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Builder(UserCodeWrapper<CrossFunction> udf)
      Creates a Builder with the provided CrossFunction implementation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CrossOperator build()
      Creates and returns a CrossOperator from using the values given to the builder.
      CrossOperator.Builder input1(Operator<Record>... inputs)
      Sets one or several inputs (union) for input 1.
      CrossOperator.Builder input1(Operator<Record> input)
      Sets the first input.
      CrossOperator.Builder input2(Operator<Record>... inputs)
      Sets one or several inputs (union) for input 2.
      CrossOperator.Builder input2(Operator<Record> input)
      Sets the second input.
      CrossOperator.Builder inputs1(List<Operator<Record>> inputs)
      Sets the first inputs.
      CrossOperator.Builder inputs2(List<Operator<Record>> inputs)
      Sets the second inputs.
      CrossOperator.Builder name(String name)
      Sets the name of this operator.
      CrossOperator.Builder setBroadcastVariable(String name, Operator<Record> input)
      Binds the result produced by a plan rooted at root to a variable used by the UDF wrapped in this operator.
      CrossOperator.Builder setBroadcastVariables(Map<String,Operator<Record>> inputs)
      Binds multiple broadcast variables.
      protected void setNameIfUnset()
